Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: the major difference between AI and a human teacher is the ability to make me understand the topic and the compassion for teaching that makes me want to study.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: yes there is a major difference between the feedbacks the AI feedbacks are just text the dont have any human intervention or major thoughts given to it but the feedback is given by a teacher are wealth out and in my best interest. also the feedback given to me by my teacher stays on my mind and makes me want to improve on the suggestion.
